typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ORDERNUMBER as string,
		QUANTITYORDERED as string,
		PRICEEACH as string,
		ORDERLINENUMBER as string,
		SALES as string,
		ORDERDATE as string,
		STATUS as string,
		QTR_ID as string,
		MONTH_ID as string,
		YEAR_ID as string,
		PRODUCTLINE as string,
		MSRP as string,
		PRODUCTCODE as string,
		CUSTOMERNAME as string,
		PHONE as string,
		ADDRESSLINE1 as string,
		ADDRESSLINE2 as string,
		CITY as string,
		STATE as string,
		POSTALCODE as string,
		COUNTRY as string,
		TERRITORY as string,
		CONTACTLASTNAME as string,
		CONTACTFIRSTNAME as string,
		DEALSIZE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Sales
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		borough as integer,
		neighborhood as string,
		building_class_category as string,
		tax_class as string,
		block as integer,
		lot as string,
		easement as string,
		building_class as string,
		address as string,
		apartment_number as string,
		zip_code as string,
		residential_units as string,
		commercial_units as string,
		total_units as string,
		land_sqft as string,
		gross_sqft as string,
		year_built as string,
		tax_class_at_sale as string,
		building_class_at_sale as string,
		sale_price as double,
		year_of_sale as integer,
		Borough1 as string,
		CD as string,
		CT2010 as string,
		CB2010 as string,
		SchoolDist as string,
		Council as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		FireComp as string,
		PolicePrct as string,
		HealthCent as string,
		HealthArea as string,
		SanitBoro as string,
		SanitDistr as string,
		SanitSub as string,
		Address1 as string,
		ZoneDist1 as string,
		ZoneDist2 as string,
		ZoneDist3 as string,
		ZoneDist4 as string,
		Overlay1 as string,
		Overlay2 as string,
		SPDist1 as string,
		SPDist2 as string,
		SPDist3 as string,
		LtdHeight as string,
		SplitZone as string,
		BldgClass as string,
		LandUse as string,
		Easements as string,
		OwnerType as string,
		OwnerName as string,
		LotArea as string,
		BldgArea as string,
		ComArea as string,
		ResArea as string,
		OfficeArea as string,
		RetailArea as string,
		GarageArea as string,
		StrgeArea as string,
		FactryArea as string,
		OtherArea as string,
		AreaSource as string,
		NumBldgs as string,
		NumFloors as string,
		UnitsRes as string,
		UnitsTotal as string,
		LotFront as string,
		LotDepth as string,
		BldgFront as string,
		BldgDepth as string,
		Ext as string,
		ProxCode as string,
		IrrLotCode as string,
		LotType as string,
		BsmtCode as string,
		AssessLand as string,
		AssessTot as string,
		ExemptLand as string,
		ExemptTot as string,
		YearBuilt as string,
		YearAlter1 as string,
		YearAlter2 as string,
		HistDist as string,
		Landmark as string,
		BuiltFAR as string,
		ResidFAR as string,
		CommFAR as string,
		FacilFAR as string,
		BoroCode as string,
		BBL as string,
		CondoNo as string,
		Tract2010 as string,
		XCoord as string,
		YCoord as string,
		ZoneMap as string,
		ZMCode as string,
		Sanborn as string,
		TaxMap as string,
		EDesigNum as string,
		APPBBL as string,
		APPDate as string,
		PLUTOMapID as string,
		FIRM07_FLA as string,
		PFIRM15_FL as string,
		Version as string,
		MAPPLUTO_F as string,
		SHAPE_Leng as string,
		SHAPE_Area as string,
		Sales_date as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	limit: 100,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	batchSize: 1000,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_COMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	partitionBy('hash', 2,
		YearAlter2
	)) ~> AzureDatabase
Sales, AzureDatabase union(byName: true,
	partitionBy('dynamicRange', 2,
		ORDERNUMBER
	))~> Mergedataset
Mergedataset sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> PowerBI
